Text.val: @Program is called from multiple programs to determine the handilng user =
DEBC_EMP_HANDLING. It's necessary that all database updates in the calling
programs are finally stored, because the program BID706, which is called inside
this program, has to obtain the database tables with the latest updates
22.09.2011 SH SCR16671 PartA: Skip test CLNT301_DUNNING = Y if
17.03.2010 GB SCR15379 Added handling for PI.PROGRAM_ID = 'BDC304'
14.10.2009 SH SCR14983 Added handling for PI.PROGRAM_ID = 'BDC307'
